question: Which Indian shuttler clinched the men's singles title at the 2019 Vietnam Open Super 100 badminton tournament?
explanation: In Badminton, Sourabh Verma clinched the men\'s singles title at the 2019 Vietnam Open Super 100 title  at the Ho Chi Minh City. He defeated China’s Sun Fei Xiang in a thrilling summit clash by 21-12, 17-2, 21-14. This victory marks Verma\'s second Super 100 win in the ongoing calendar year. He had won the Hyderabad Open earlier in August.
